properties.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - August 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This pipeline will pull all the data from the required fields of ACCOUNT table on a truncate and reload strategy from CRM and load it into CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG table in MsDynamics STAGE_CDI.

activities.name: sp-TRUNCATE-CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Aug 2023
Project - CRM Mirgation, implemented under CHG#####
Description - As a part of truncate and reload strategy ,this stored procedure will truncate the table CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG before loading any data into it .

activities.name: cd-CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Aug 2023
Project - CRM Migration, implemented under CHG######
Description - This copy activity will copy all the selected field's data of Account table from CRM to CRM_PLAT_DYN_DIVORCECLAIM_STG table of STAGE_CDI CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG table.

activities.name: sp-UPDATE_BATCH_AUDIT-CRM_PLAT_DYN_ACCOUNT_STG
activities.description:
Name - Nikita Varnwal
Date - Aug 2023
Project - CRM Migration. implemented under CHG#####
Description - This stored procedure is updating the BATCH_AUDIT table in STAGE_CDI with the required information of pipeline run .
